website_summaries.verdict: A top pain relief brand that's trusted by athletes and professionals.
pros: Comes in a large bottle, so there's plenty to use
Fast-acting and long lasting, this gel is especially effective for soreness in large muscles, the back, and joints
It also works well to alleviate pain due to arthritis
cons: The gel is thick and gives off a strong menthol smell, which may turn some users off

customer_reviews.title: Biofreeze pain Relief Gel, 32 ounce Bottle with Pump
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use so much of this that I purchase it in the 32 ounce bottle. Biofreeze is the first product that not only relieves my pain but also stops the pain shortly after applying. Biofreeze works fast. I have used the roll on, the gel, the spray and they are all effective. This is one product I will alway have around the house. It works great for minor pain but also intense pain. If you're in intense pain it at least takes the edge off for awhile. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: It Works A+++ (You May Now Empty Your Medicine Cabinet Of All Topical Pain Products That Didn't)
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor, physical therapist, and massage therapist all use this. I currently use the roll on however at this sale price point, the gel will be more generously applied when and where needed. I've gone with many over the counter products in the past (Tiger Balm, Ben-Gay, Emu Juice, red hot burn your skin off stuff.) This product soothes, relieves, and lasts for a couple of hours, including some fairly painful finger joints, just don't rub your eyes or crotch.
customer_reviews.author: Cap Capello

customer_reviews.title: Works great - especially for a bodybuilder with lot of aches and pain!
customer_reviews.text: I use this after workout on my knees and ankles. Helps with discomfort from lifting, squats, etc... It squirts out green but is clear once applied to your muscles/skin. I also bought this for my mother and my aunt who both have arthritis issues when they sleep. So I can attest for different age group this works for all ages. A great bonus is this is not addictive or dangerous compared to other brands such as BenGay etc... I find the BIG 32 oz is a better value for your money then the smaller 3 oz or 8 oz ones. So this is the size I always purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NudistBodybuilder

customer_reviews.title: I breathe better using it. QT bottle lasts LONG TIME.
customer_reviews.text: What I like is the scent of Menthol and Camphor. It works wonders for immediately opening my sinuses. I know this is an off label use but it does work for that and very well indeed. 5 star for sinuses. As far as pain relief I'd give it a 4. My guess is that works better for some people than others. Works OK for me. Roughly the same as a couple ibuprofen or Aleve. I bought the quart bottle as one hand is loaded w arthritis and the other hand needs carpal tunnel surgery (in 3 weeks or so). Bottom line is that it works for pain but works better as sinus treatment.
customer_reviews.author: ELMac

customer_reviews.title: This really helped me
customer_reviews.text: Studied and have used various pain relief remedies as I am a physician and former director of a pain clinic at a Medical school. I am now using this biofreeze gel for my own osteoarthritis and it has really helped especially in the wet cold northeast. This is the best product I have used and I recommend it. I bought this myself and have tried other amazon products sold that did very little for my pain
customer_reviews.author: thebarbecuemaster

customer_reviews.title: Great product for your massage!
customer_reviews.text: I get a 90-minute massage and my wife gets a 60-minute massage weekly. We purchased this and gave it to our massage therapist to use instead of the regular lotion. It penetrates so much better, feels cool when it is rubbed onto your body and it stays with you for a few hours after the massage. Really has improved the feel of our massage.
customer_reviews.author: Cattleman's

customer_reviews.title: The biofreeze helps a lot and I dread to think what would have happened if I did not have it during some of the more painful ins
customer_reviews.text: this has been a lifesaver for back/hip relief. I have pinched my sciatic nerve and at time the aching pain is unbearable. The biofreeze helps a lot and I dread to think what would have happened if I did not have it during some of the more painful instances. I highly recommend this. The 32 oz bottle is the best value. I can't recommend this more.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Lee

customer_reviews.title: Bio-Freeze 32 oz pump bottle
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this religiously for pain relief following a shoulder injury. I was surprised that the bottle actually leaked inside the plastic bag it was in.....which turned out to be a good thing because the bottle cap was loose.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy M.

customer_reviews.title: Doctor Recommended (at least two of us)
customer_reviews.text: As a physician, I am quite skeptical of topical agents for pain relief, but this stuff works very well for minor aches and pains. I have found it especially effective for shoulders and knees and would expect it to be useful for any ordinary muscle or joint pain. I frequently recommend it to patients in my practice as an emergency physician. It was initially recommended to me by my internist, which was the only thing that overcame my natural skepticism and got me to try it. (I've known him for 35 years and trust his judgment.)
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Solomon, M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for pain
customer_reviews.text: I fell and hurt my shoulder, used this for about a month and eventually my shoulder healed itself, but for that month it did hurt. I would put the Biofreeze on and my pain would almost go completely away. This is a huge bottle and the price is great. They sell the very small tube at Drug stores for $6 - $8. I would highly recommend this product for aches and pains.
customer_reviews.author: Mark St

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful and Review Orders
customer_reviews.text: Biofreeze is an excellent product, but dealing with the Amazon fufillment, not so much. This is listed for $3.00 less than I was charged before I even received it. But worse, I previously purchased as "colorless". When I hit "buy again", I foolishly thought they would send the same product. This time it is the originasl green color. Not the end of the world, but frustrating. It seems that it would be simple enough to duplicate a previous order--right?
customer_reviews.author: Roger C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, two flaws for the amount of many spent.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is awesome. My concern is that the bottle was open and it came with an expiration date of 7 months. I purchased this item for 50 dollars for the 32oz bottle, there's just no way possible for me to use this product before the date of expire. Amazon needs to do a better job with packagin and check for expiration dates under a year. The length of potency of product is not listed on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: dimples

customer_reviews.title: Ease Your Pain In Minutes, Forever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. My alternative Dr. gave me this. It's awesome and the pain vanishes. It took away my mother-in-law's shoulder pain (81 Yrs. old) that she had for over a year with one use. She's been using it ever since and is never without it. I highly recommend it to anyone who has muscle aches, arthritis or bursitis pain, etc. This is no joke, it's the best pain reliever I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Between massage maintenance assistance
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to Biofreeze after a massage in a cruise ship spa. I resisted the onboard sales pitch and got this huge bottle for a little bit more than they were charging for a much smaller one. Great for the tight muscles across my upper back. Also good for my knees... Non-greasy and I like the aroma.
customer_reviews.author: RoofingPrincess

customer_reviews.title: DELIVERY WITH A SMILE! MADE HAPPY CAMPERS FOR SELLER AND BUYER!!!
customer_reviews.text: THE USPS WILL TAKE YOUR JOBS AWAY IF YOU ARE a CARRIER for a competing outfit!! A SMILE YOU CAN COUNT ON! THE UNITED STATES POST OFFICE DELIVERED EFFICIENTLY, RESPECTFULLY AND CARRIED ITEMS INTO HOUSE!!! SO THANKFUL FOR THE GREAT WORK YOU DO FOR AMAZON AND ME!!! THANK YOU SO MUCH!! HOW WONDERFUL TO SEE CARRIERS DELIVER AS THEY SHOULD! CARRIERS: READ DELIVERY INSTRUCTIONS
customer_reviews.author: June Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Biofreezeze
customer_reviews.text: Between the arthritis and the "grinding of bone on bone in my hip, I could not live without. Per my chiropractor, you can use this gel "til the cows come home" and there will been no side effects. I use it about 3 to 5 times per day and before bed time.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product for mild pain control
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous product for keeping mild pain under control. I use it several times a day. Once in the a.m. after shower and once before bed. I have arthristis in the tops of my feet which can really be debilitating but this keeps the pain under control. A little goes a long way. The smell, of course is of menthol but is disapates quickly. Besides most of the times I'm home and don't care that I small like a walking medicine cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: quiltmakerTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Did not work well for me...could be defective batch (???)
customer_reviews.text: Idk if I just got a bad batch or something but it didn't work for more that 2 minutes....we had to get a 2nd bottle sent to us to replace the first one and even the 2md bottle was marginally better.
customer_reviews.author: DJ AK1 of J-Town Inc.

customer_reviews.title: compared to others, it may be the best
customer_reviews.text: It is not a miracle treatment, it does sooth a bit, I have bad arthritis and don't expect things to make a big difference but it's probably better than most of these types of products. I have tried about 4 other types and this seems to work best.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Great Relief from Pain!
customer_reviews.text: Biofreeze is the best rub on product on the market for pain that I have found. It goes on easily and is not greasy. You can put Biofreeze on before going out and not worry about the menthol smell that you usually get from other products. There is a slight pleasant smell when you first put is on but this disapears in about 20 minutes or less and does not seem to leave any odor on your clothes. The most important thing is that it works very quickly and efficiently on pain caused by arthritis or muscle pain. I have both these issues in my back and am very happy with the results I get from Biofreeze.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie J

customer_reviews.title: I use this in combination with ice packs on my ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this in combination with ice packs on my knees after basketball. The combination works perfectly for me. I feel that this quickens and enhances the effect of icing my knees. I play basketball before work and I only have about 15 minutes to ice my knees. I feel that is makes the process more efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works so much better than other over the counter ointments. I'm a therapist and I use this at work very often. I know it works well so I had to purchase myself some for home use. For some reason, if purchase at Walmart or other stores, it's a little weaker. The Amazon brand was much more clinical strength.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny M

customer_reviews.title: dont leave home without it
customer_reviews.text: at 72 my body gets stiff after long walks and long swims...sometimes even over do it and twist a knee or sprain a muscle...my wife says "go to the doctor" ( instead I'm smearing bio-freeze on the aches and pains)...and I'm good to go...buy it in the large pump container...you will not regret it
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Techer

customer_reviews.title: Love Biofreeze
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I was first introduced to it by the doctor at my one and only visit to a chiropractor for a sore lower back. I use it on sore knees and shoulders too. I used to buy the 4 oz gel tubes but have graduated to the 32 oz pump. A much better buy. I've just bought my second one and recently bought one for my mom too. She loves it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product that really relieves certain types of pain
customer_reviews.text: I am a power lifter and I used this to relieve chronic pain that I have in my right shoulder. The pain that I experience is something that I have had in one degree or another for thirty years or more, and occasionally it is so severe that I have trouble lifting my arm. Biofreeze mutes and sometimes completely eliminates the pain. This product produces what it promises and I use it nearly daily. I also apply it in the gym before a lifting session.
customer_reviews.author: Roger M. Woodbury

customer_reviews.title: Great Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: The cool, pain relieving gel has been a must since having back surgery. it has been soothing on the muscles to the side of the incision. Highly recommend for aches and muscle pain relief. Lasts longer than any pain relief cream or gel.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Davis

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product and Price
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used Bio Freeze for years to treat minor joint and muscle pain. I use it every night on my foot. Wouldn’t be without it! It helps with pain and swelling. Amazon price is a fraction of what the local chiropractor charges.
customer_reviews.author: KarenS50

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is great for sore muscles and is used by most cyropractors. To buy this stuff in the store is expensive and you only get a small tube, O.K. if you don't use it very often. But this 32oz bottle is very little more than 2 or 3 tubes found at Walmart. If you use ointment this is the best you can buy and it is the most inexpensive way to buy it. Amazon carries smaller sizes also so check them out. Will buy this product again. JLH
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth its weight in gold.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I put it on, it starts working to remove pain in my shoulder and hip. I have R. A. do not like to take pain pills, so this was suggested instead. Used it immediately and got results in minutes. Love the large size, do not have to order often.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Got introduced to this product at podiatrist office but very expensive if you buy at doctor's office. So happy to have found this online at reasonable price. Works well relieving muscle aches....I use on knees and back. It gave more relief to my knees than the (expensive) prescription cream from my doctor. Word of caution if you wear contacts.....put them in before applying product as it takes multiple scrubbings before product totally removed from hands.
customer_reviews.author: dt

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! My husband is doing his physical therapy and they use it there. They did recommend wearing gloves to apply it so you don't rub your eyes with it on your hands. I get the 100 for a dollar and the dollar stores. I think it works better than blue emu and Australian Dream. This size bottle is a bargain
customer_reviews.author: Starzzz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: when I bought the 32 oz bottle back in July I paid $34. I went to order it again and now it's $45 - $52 for the 32 oz. What is going on? You have out priced yourself for me. I have used this product for about 20 years, but I'm done with you now. When you go back to charging a reasonable price I will buy it again, that is of course if I don't find something I can afford that I like.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Not original green formula like product description states. If I wanted the clear less effective biofreeze I would have ordered it for the cheaper price. Plus the bottle leaked... So frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: ABS

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by an EMS volunteer a few years ago. I suffer from muscle cramps and strains from exercising and back pain as well. This is a great product. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Kruszka

customer_reviews.title: The Secret "sauce" your therapist recommends...
customer_reviews.text: Had several injuries Over four year period ,requiring many therapy sessions ! It took also a while for me to realize and concentrate on this magic rub by the professional therapists that I had .....finally they broke confidence and gave me the name!.....I buy Biofreeze in the jumbo size now and you gym lovers must buy it and I promise it will be your best rub and friend ?!
customer_reviews.author: Health seeker

customer_reviews.title: Did it's job
customer_reviews.text: It numbed my joint pain and muscle pain, it absorbed into my skin nicely, didn't dry my sensitive skin out too much, can't complain. Smell was a bit much but that's expected with menthol based things.
customer_reviews.author: DODS

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail of pain relief products
customer_reviews.text: This is the holy grail of pain relief. If you've thought about trying it but never have, concider this your sign. I worked in the housekeeping department at a very busy hotel and it was a lifesaver. It's also great for the summer to help cool down, just put a little on the back of your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by my chiropractor. I tried a few samples and it works great. I like that it doesn't have a medicine scent and is uses natural solutions rather than chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Effective product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the relief provided by Biofreeze Pain Relief Gel. It applies easily, is non-sticky and is absorbed quickly. You will feel its effect immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Camy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Size : Love the Pump, Love the Price!
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is HUGE, and it will probably last me a year! Great product that my chiropractor uses in his office and I can't be without at home!, I love the pump, because it delivers just the right amount for my problem areas. Easy on my hands and fingers on painful days. With Biofreeze, a little goes a long way. I recommend this to everyone! Great size at a great price. Arrived in a day on Amazon Prime. Ahhhh. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: C.A.Beck

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff! You have to try it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this smaller size for my husband to take to work. We love this product. Any ache or pain is gone after using. Is it a miracle, no, but feels & works great. Hubs had back broken mid July form auto accident. Found this to work better than Ben-gay. We use on his back morning & night and he gets relief from this.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bennett

customer_reviews.title: I have a monthly subscription...
customer_reviews.text: Biofreeze is a staple in our house. I have a monthly subscription and typically look forward to it's arrive. This month though, 1/4 of the bottle was already all over the bag it came in. This could have been solved by taping down the pump. I'm annoyed and will probably look somewhere else for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: this gel is "ok" at best. I still gave it 5 stars because the ...
customer_reviews.text: this gel is "ok" at best. I still gave it 5 stars because the product itself is decent, it takes about 2 minutes for you to feel the cooling sensation and it isn't as "strong" as you may imagine.. but i enjoy the spray a lot more, feels like it works faster and i enjoy that super cold feeling more.
customer_reviews.author: philip kim

customer_reviews.title: Biofreeze pain reliever gel really freezes out the pain!
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by a friend. She lent me some to try because I was leery that I'd just be wasting $$ on another snake oil formula. I have a difficult time managing a number of pain issues: torn rotator cuff, fibromyalgia and chronic pain related to cervical & lumbar spine injuries. After trying DMSO, NSAIDS, heavy duty drugs, TENS, Lidocaine patches, I was pleasantly surprised to find this gel works so well. I am now able to work & exercise with less pain. I still have my bad days but Biofreeze has made them more bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery to Me

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I've found to help neuropathy on the ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I've found to help neuropathy on the skin and underneath. Radio Frequency leaves the skin on my back and my nerves inside raw for months. This stuff is the only product I've found that gives me relief. Thank you!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marci Krushinsky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  for Temporary Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: This works very well and is easily applied and massaged into the affected area. After using a number pain relief rubs, this one seemed most effective. As with most pain relief rubs, it is not a permanent remedy, but it does provide a good temporary relief.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not Greasy, Not Overly Smelly
customer_reviews.text: I first experienced this product after receiving an overpriced massage and then was charged for the bio freeze application. I hopped on Amazon and found this gem and have been using it on sore muscles ever since. The cold sensation is great for relieving slight pain and soreness. I like having the large pump jug around because it beats battling the little packets. I now have my wife hooked on the stuff, too. The best part about this product is that it isn't nearly as greasy as some topicals I have tried and it doesn't carry a strong odor like others.
customer_reviews.author: bdeibs (Quality Connoisseur)

customer_reviews.title: BIOFREEZE IS GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: The Biofreeze gel is amazing. I became familiar with the product 2 years ago and it worked extremely well with my knee discomfort. I bought a 32 oz size since I use it daily. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Matthews-Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad who suffers from arthritis and lower back pain. He said it gives him pain relief. The only thing I don't like is the price, it's not affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle

customer_reviews.title: BioFreeze is Cool Comfort
customer_reviews.text: After a joint replacement I was introduced to BioFreeze by my team of physical therapists. At the end of each session a therapist gently massaged the cool, blue gel into my hand and wrist. I found it to be more soothing than any product I had previously used. The icy blue gel is not greasy and does not have a medicinal odor. Rather it has a clean minty smell which quickly dissipates. BioFreeze continues to provide comfort for several hours. As an avid gardener I frequently have sore muscles or minor bruises. BioFreeze penetrates quickly and provides immediate relief for my aches and pains. I like the ease of the pump bottle,too.
customer_reviews.author: twin spotties

customer_reviews.title: Biofreeze is the best thing to ever be invented
customer_reviews.text: Biofreeze is the best thing to ever be invented! This has helped with our muscle aches, back pain, migraines... everything! We can't keep enough of this stuff in the house! I tell all my friends about this magical stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Amason

customer_reviews.title: Super stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that we find really helps back pain. The aerosol spray cans work super as well. We will not be without either for chronic lower back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product --have had it used on me by physical therapists & I have a an ultra sound machine & use it as the "conductor" for it . Leaves the area used on feeling cool & tingly .
customer_reviews.author: Kay Schultz

customer_reviews.title: ... ache at times (my right shoulder does exhibit a good range of motion so the surgeon doesn't think the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Biofreeze for a couple of years now because I have a severely torn right rotator cuff that tends to ache at times (my right shoulder does exhibit a good range of motion so the surgeon doesn't think the condition would be improved by surgery). So, the Biofreeze serves to eliminate some of the discomfort so I can get to sleep at night and go about my days without favoring the shoulder. For those who look for details, it is my supraspinatus muscle that is most affected by the tear and I have a dip behind my right shoulder that evidences the recession of the muscle there.
customer_reviews.author: Bananaman

customer_reviews.title: this stuff is great and doesnt have that awful smell others do. Price is great
customer_reviews.text: this works great on my knees and shoulders any achy joint really. The price for this handy large size bottle is a major savings over the small tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best pain reliever around and I've dated quite a few
customer_reviews.text: Best pain reliever around and I've dated quite a few! It's too bad that you can't buy it at a mainstream pharmacy. Just got out of the shower and rubbed the gel into my sore neck muscles. We are In the middle of a huge snow storm and between the wet heavy snow shoveling and falling on the ice walking the dog I'm in need of a heavy hitter. Bio freeze is better than my anti inflammatory right now. If it would only remove the snow snacking pounds i'd be all set. I can get out to the gym. so I'm extra achey. Snow shoveling is toture not exercise.
customer_reviews.author: lyne stokes

customer_reviews.title: It works great for any pain
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff I suffer with chronic pain throughout my entire body and I use this jel daily, it's truly a life saver for me I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: A great product at an unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Every night, my sweet wife rubs some of this into my sore shoulders. (I spend too much time at the computer writing reviews of products.) It goes on cool, and within 5 minutes it heats up, and the pain just disappears. I got tired of spending $14 for 4 oz tubes of this product. $40 for a full quart is definitely the way to go. At the 4 oz price, you would pay $112 for 32 oz. Save yourself a lot of money, buy the big bottle, and feel your sore muscles and joints get very happy very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: GWH

customer_reviews.title: And then BIOFREEZE WOMAN was invented...
customer_reviews.text: After suffering terrible for months with a shoulder and upper back problems, this stuff is the only thing that got me through the day. I used it so much that I constantly smelled like BIOFREEZE. So my boyfriend and I thought that BIOFREEZE WOMAN would be my new superhero name. I even made up a song and sang it while he applied it to my back. He complained it burned his eyes. Anyway, it really helps with the pain. I don't know if I was suppose to use it as much as I did, but I didn't care at the time. When you hurting you will do anything to relieve the pain. This works pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: nae4nola

customer_reviews.title: Love the large size
customer_reviews.text: Works well on knee pain. The large size is a plus and economical. better for the environment too, as it replaces all the smaller spray cans and bottles.
customer_reviews.author: hbayou

customer_reviews.title: I love it; it works so well
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this bottle of Bio Freeze to fill my 16 oz. bottle which is almost empty. I love it; it works so well. Sometimes I use it at night and sometimes when I get up in the morning. It works very well for my spinal stenosis.
customer_reviews.author: JUDE 24

customer_reviews.title: My dad has been using Biofreeze for years for his ...
customer_reviews.text: My dad has been using Biofreeze for years for his neuropathy. He has pain and tingling in his feet at night when his feet are level with his body not so much during the day. He prefers the green color but the clear color is much easier to clean up
customer_reviews.author: nightlightview

customer_reviews.title: Top quality pain control
customer_reviews.text: I so appreciate the pain relief from this product which last me about 3 to 4 hours. It helps me sleep, thankfully. It does have a smell but the benefits surpass the smell.
customer_reviews.author: BARB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent outcome
customer_reviews.text: I am a veteran and spoke to another vet at the VA in Boise and he recommended Biofreeze to me. I have a very bad orthoarthritic right hip and am currently waiting for a hip replacement at the VA. I have used the Biofreeze for about three weeks and the pain and stiffness in my hip has been greatly alleviated. It has reduced the inflammation and muscle tightness around the joint and has greatly reduced the constant pain that I was enduring for the last several years. I will continue to use it because it has helped me so much, I hope that it does the same for you. Purchasing it from Amazon has also saved me money.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Relieves the pain but still carries the menthol smell
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does help relieve pain in my knees and shins that I get from running. It goes on pretty clean as well and only takes a few moments to dry. You can feel the same old "burn" as you would experience with ben-gay / similar products. I am giving this 4 stars (vs 5) only because I thought it was non menthol smell but it does have the menthol / rubbing alcohol type smell with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer 98765

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works really Good!!! Relieves a lot of the extreme pain (ie makes it more barrable). Definitely would recommend to friends and family members...
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: No Mess Application
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. Its gel like to its not greasy and easy to apply to the area. I used it for my lower back, it soothes it and you get a cooling sensation. I always keep this in my house to use on any sore muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Garima Pathak

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: WORKS!!!!! Heck yeah! Ive used this for a while and it worked when others fail. I have several replaced, fused joints. In pain daily; when it strikes this stuff provides instant relief. Rub it in, wipe away the excess and you can enjoy life. You can buy it in stores if you want to pay 4 times as much this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for Pain!
customer_reviews.text: After rubbing this gel on, you get a real cooling effect while it works on the pain. It really helps. I prefer the menthol to the plain.
customer_reviews.author: shoecanary

customer_reviews.title: I found that it was the best product to give me some relieve from the constant ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased Biofreeze from my Physical Therapist who used it on my arm which had sustained vein, nerve & tissue damage from chemotherapy that was administered through an IV. I found that it was the best product to give me some relieve from the constant pain my arm was in. I have been using this for months now and found that it is a great product. The price on Amazon is slightly better than from other medical offices so I have chosen to purchase it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Benie's Buys

customer_reviews.title: Biofreeze is best
customer_reviews.text: I've used Biofreeze for quite a few years. It works really well and helps alleviate pain. This bottle is very large and is a really good price compared to the smaller tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: Biofreeze--the best gel for muscle soreness
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different remedies for muscle and joint pain, and this is so far out in front of the pack that the others pale by comparison. I have back issues of longstanding, and this wonderful gel gives me hours of relief. It allows me to stand straight when I would otherwise be bent with pain. BTW, it is also available in a roll-on, as well as a 4-oz tube of gel; however I purchase it in the 32-oz. pump bottle! Also, good to know that this product does not stain clothing. Yes, if you do not rub it in well, it could rub off on an undergarment, but it comes out readily when washed, even in clear water.
customer_reviews.author: Judith L. Isaacson

customer_reviews.title: A Great-For-After-Surgery topical anaesthetic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my knee when, after surgery, I kept having some residual pain and also put it on my hip that started hurting because of the way I was favoring my knee. It worked so well that I put it on a particularly bothersome muscle in my back and it worked well there, too. I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: casey trient

customer_reviews.title: Cooling sensation works
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my aching hip. Makes sure to wash it off your hands after applying, or you'll notice the cooling sensation in your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bray

customer_reviews.title: Works best of all products
customer_reviews.text: I have used the roll on but this is so much better. Has a strong scent but does disparate in a little bit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Works
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Biofreeze for maybe 10 years. Keep going back to it because it seems to work the best for us. I am 74 & wife is 71. Both of us still very active, including riding motorcycles. This helps to keep us that way.
customer_reviews.author: Russell E. Marooney

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for my pain. it smells like menthol for a little bit but goes away pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ralphiewinklebuns

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: After shoulder surgery, my physical therapists used this to massage the area every time I worked out. I liked it so much, I had to buy some for home. One of the things I like about Biofreeze is that it isn't just menthol...the homeopathics included in the formula are a bonus. I can see myself using this for any sore muscle situation even after my shoulder is back up and working!
customer_reviews.author: FLPons

customer_reviews.title: Great pain relief
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pain relievers out there. Used in physical therapy offices. Gives a cooling sensation. Starts working a minute or 2 after application.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: After workout rubdown
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for about 10 years. I had a physical therapist introduce it to me and I started the online search for how to purchase because it is way overpriced in every PT office in the town I live in. Most people would compare it to Icy Hot or Ben Gay but natural. I will never use anything else. My Parents actually use it now as well and they state it helps with their arthritis in their hands. I am not even 30 yet though and have no arthritis so I can not speak to the authenticity of the claim but they say it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Namdor

customer_reviews.title: Great pain relief.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing at reliving joint pain and muscle pain. I highly recommend this pain reliever.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: We love Biofreeze and have been using it for years for sore and stiff muscles. Great value for the large size.
customer_reviews.author: Okie Girl

customer_reviews.title: It pretty much still works (really well) just as I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I started using this about 15 years ago. It pretty much still works (really well) just as I had remembered it back then and the ingredients haven't changed much either. It provides great relief for sore muscles and joints, to the occasional light sprain. It comes out green, but is pretty much colorless applied, and provide a great cooling sensation. The mint is definitely spicy, but it's rather inoffensive and doesn't linger for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Cheng

customer_reviews.title: A must have for anyone who experiences muscle pain.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is absolutely amazing. I have tried different products in the past like icy hot, but this is by far the best product I have ever used. I have pinched muscles sometimes that make it difficult to stand up straight. After rubbing some of this on there and letting it sit for a bit I am up walking around like I never had any pain at all. The other thing that some reviewers state is that it just masks pain, but for me after it wears off the muscle actually seems relaxed and the pain is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie R

customer_reviews.title: A good and quick pain relief
customer_reviews.text: This has helped me control my pain and I have not had to increased my pain medication. I like the scent and the way the Biofreeze works.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Laird

customer_reviews.title: Biofreeze is gentle and effective!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Biofreeze for several months now. I am very satisfied with the results I have received by using it. It definitely helps the pain in my rear end go away so I don't even feel the pain. I would recommend it to anyone who wanted to use it. It is very gentle feeling and you can feel the heat from the biofreeze penetrating your skin and taking away the pain. It lasts nearly all day, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my back pain.I had lower back pain . It hurts so bad when i sit down for a while or walking . This Pain relief gel does relief very fast and work very deep inside. It last about 1 to 2 hrs. I feel much better then the last 3 weeks, now i only apply once before i go to bed .I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Stuff, But So Expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful stuff, but so expensive. Also, I mainly only feel it on my back, shoulders, neck, and knees. Which is great but b/c those are the most problematic areas for me. But I cannot feel it really at all on my feet or calves.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTS!  7/19
customer_reviews.text: HAVE USED THIS FOR THE PAST SEVERAL YEARS OVER A LARGE PART OF MY BODY BECAUSE I'VE SUFFERED FOR 27 YEARS AND 24 HOURS A DAY PAIN WITH A "DOUBLE PORTION OF FIBROMYALGIA" AND SEVERAL ARTHRITIS CONDITIONS, AND AM UNABLE TO TAKE ANY KINDS OF PAIN MEDICINES BECAUSE THEY ALL INTERFERE WITH MY PRESCRIPTION DRUGS. ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT. 7/19
customer_reviews.author: ARLENE DE VITO

customer_reviews.title: It’s a very good product. And I will continue to purchase some biofreeze.
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in both of my knees. And pain in my back . And that’s what I use the biofreeze for . And for any joints on my body that hurts. It’s a very good product. I told this man about the biofreeze and he said that he would purchase one from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: DAWN GRANT

customer_reviews.title: Great to help me fall asleep faster!
customer_reviews.text: It’s part of of my arsenal to relieve my spinal fusion surgery pain. I use it with a large heating pad at bedtime and off to Lala land I go. Zzz
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: I use a lot of Biofreeze and highly recommend it for any type of pain
customer_reviews.text: Since I have neuropathy from the waist down I have a lot of nerve pain and Biofreeze calms down that pain especially at night when I get quiet and try to rest. It calms the nerves down enough that my legs dont jump around. I use a lot of Biofreeze and highly recommend it for any type of pain.
customer_reviews.author: K-Lee Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Pain relief was excellent. Container pump does not empty the container of jell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can rest long enough to fall asleep.
customer_reviews.text: I love the big bottle. I use this 3-4 nights a week on my back and left leg.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Warning to the dudes out there
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty solid at relieving pain. Just a warning to all the gentleman out there: Do not apply this gel prior to taking a leak. Your you-know-what will burn for hours. And you don't want that. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this and I am finally getting real relief
customer_reviews.text: I only did one knee. I woke up with that knee in severe pain. I love this and I am finally getting real relief. The knee I did do had been broken in three breaks just below the knee on the tibia. It finally did not hurt as it had been prior. I do wish it came in a spray so I could get my back.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: I'M GETTING DEFINITR IMPROVEMENT
customer_reviews.text: There seems to be a definite improvement in my back pain since I started using Biofreeze. I have not had much success with other pain killers. I have only been using it for about a week, but my pain almost goes away. I intend to keep using it sin ce it works better than anything else I use.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy Don

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product..sleep saver.
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this every night just so he can get relief from severe knee pain. On nights he has forgotten he can't sleep. It is the best pain gel we have ever used. Minimal odor...long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Danette Lentz

customer_reviews.title: Soothing cream
customer_reviews.text: Very strong smell, but a great soothing cream. My husband has a tingling nerve pain since he is always on his feet and this helps put him to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Farhana

customer_reviews.title: We highly recommend this for muscle strains
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Biofreeze for years because of joint pain. The product I received today is the same as we had been using - Menthol 4% as its active ingredient and multiple "inactive" ingredients including arnica Montana flower extract and boswellia carterii resin extract among the others. Manufactured in the U.S.A. The only caution we would advise of, is the green color can temporarily stain clothes (we haven't seen any permanent staining). We highly recommend this for muscle strains, joint pain and other uses where "cooling" would be beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

product_meta.title: Biofreeze Pain Relief Gel, 32 oz. Pump, Green (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Style:32 oz. PumpThere is no limit to what you can do when you cool your aches and pains. For over 25 years, Biofreeze has been the secret weapon of clinical professionals and athletes providing cold therapy pain relief for sore muscles, backaches, sore joints and arthritis. Overcome pain and get back to your best fast with the #1 clinically recommended topical pain relief brand.
feature_bullets: #1 Clinically Recommended: Trusted by pharmacists, physical therapists, chiropractors, massage therapists, podiatrists, and athletic trainers
Unique cooling menthol formula is backed by science and research-proven to deliver fast acting, long lasting and deep penetrating pain relief for sore muscles, backaches, sore joints, and arthritis
Trusted by some of the world's best athletes and athletic trainers
32 oz. gel bottle with pump is particularly well-suited for massage applications on larger muscle areas
Biofreeze gel applies easily and penetrates quickly for fast pain relief; product is not tested on animals, made with USP grade ingredients, and free of NSAIDs, parabens, and propylene glycol
